tagged_story_for_tts:
<[silence:3600]>
"Headphones" <[silence:1200]>
originates from "head" (Old English hēafod) <[silence:250]>
and "phone" (Greek phōnē, "sound") <[silence:1200]>
First used in 1910 for single-ear military devices <[silence:250]>
later evolving into stereo audio <[silence:3600]>.
